Being the incomparable history of Joseph. / Written originally in French, and illustrated by the unparallel'd pen of the learned De Ceriziers, almoner to my lord the Kings brother. And now rendred into English by Sir William Lowre Knight.
Joseph, ou la Providence divine. English
titleStmt.author: Cerisiers, René de, 1609-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.G. for Charles Adams, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Talbot near S. Dunstans Church in Fleetstreet.,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Cerisiers, René de. Joseph, ou la Providence divine.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb. 12. 1654"; the second 5 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
